title: Notes and Corrections on Midrash Lekach Tov on Esther

titles.text: הערות ותיקונים על מדרש לקח טוב על אסתר

schema.key: Notes and Corrections on Midrash Lekach Tov on Esther

enDesc: Scholarly notes, references and citation of textual variants from this careful scholar and editor of many volumes of the Midrash. The notes were published alongside the first printing of the first two volumes (on Genesis and Exodus) of this book of midrash.
